config.hook_desc: Adds a map to users profiles

file.hooks_source:
<?php

/**

 * @author      Stuart Silvester
 * @package     Member Map
 * @version     1.0.8
 */

class memberMapProfile
{
	function __construct()
	{
		$this->registry =	ipsRegistry::instance();
		$this->settings  =&	$this->registry->fetchSettings();

		$classToLoad = IPSLib::loadLibrary( IPSLib::getAppDir( 'membermap' ) . "/sources/classes/mapLib.php", 'mapLib', 'membermap' );
		$this->mapLib = new $classToLoad( $this->registry );
	}

	public function getOutput()
	{
		$perm = $this->mapLib->getPermissions();

        if ( ! $this->registry->permissions->check( 'view', $perm ) )
        {
			return '';
		}

		$member = $this->registry->output->getTemplate('profile')->functionData['profileModern'][0]['member'];

		$marker = $this->mapLib->getSingleMarker($member['member_id']);

		if($marker)
		{
			return $this->registry->getClass('output')->getTemplate('membermap')->mapProfile( $marker );
		}
		return '';
	}
}
?>
